item.description:
Anyone want to get in a weekend run or walk at the track? I'm trying to keep up with three times a week and having other people to meet make it more fun!

It'll be in the 40's so layer up! But start off the weekend getting in a run, jog or a few laps of walking... whatever works for you. Remember your water.

We'll meet by the entrance to the track next to the bleachers. Late arrivals just start in at your own pace or catch up to others already on the track.



10am
Braintree HS Track
128 Town St
Braintree, MA

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Weekend Track time to run or walk
